channel.title: Comments on: What Will iPhone5 Mean To Corona SDK Developers

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: I've been using my iPhone five for a while now and I think most of the apps I use have converted over to iPhone five support. However I happened across a few that have not and it's probably because it doesn't make sense for them to spend the time doing it when the app already works just fine. I guess it's a case-by-case basis.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been using my iPhone five for a while now and I think most of the apps I use have converted over to iPhone five support. However I happened across a few that have not and it’s probably because it doesn’t make sense for them to spend the time doing it when the app already works just fine. I guess it’s a case-by-case basis.
